definition: considered to be/at last
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
is/are/am/yes/to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: I think my brother has finally kicked the gambling habit.
sentences.chinese: 我想我哥哥算是绝对改掉牌赌的恶习啦。

sentences.english: 2，Is it still a direct barter trade?
sentences.chinese: 这还算是一种直接的易货贸易吗？

sentences.english: so we're relatively rich into, in the Caribbean, you know.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们在加勒比海地区算是比较富有的。

sentences.english: This is the hydrangea's season, So they all look beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 现在算是绣球花的季节，所以开得很漂亮。

sentences.english: Professor McGonagall blew her nose in reply.
sentences.chinese: 麦康娜教授抽动了一下鼻子算是回应。

sentences.english: This one showed us why it was called saw scaled viper.
sentences.chinese: 这一次我们算是见识到什么叫做锯状鳞片蝰蛇。

sentences.english: I consider Vietnamese pho, Middle Eastern shawarmas and all that stuff to be fast food as well.
sentences.chinese: 我认为越南米线，中东烤肉也算是快餐。

sentences.english: Bret : These movies were indebted to the carnival and the freak show.
sentences.chinese: 此类电影应该算是得益于狂欢节及怪诞异常的表演。

sentences.english: Luke:So salmon and crab are both considered red meat?
sentences.chinese: 所以鲑鱼跟螃蟹也都算是红肉啰？

sentences.english: The struggle, if there were one, need not be described.
sentences.chinese: 如果这算是一场激争，那是无须描述的。

sentences.english: China ranks as one of the world's largest countries.
sentences.chinese: 中国可算是世界上最大的国家之一。

sentences.english: But even so I do very well. I am one of the seers-off.
sentences.chinese: 不过也还算凑和，现在算是个送行人员吧。

sentences.english: Except the tendency to squeeze others on their throat occasionally, he is a good-tempered guy.
sentences.chinese: 除了偶尔掐人脖子之外，他还算是个好脾气的家伙。

sentences.english: In China during anti-Japan riots, yes.
sentences.chinese: 中国的反日游行，算是吧。

sentences.english: A: What would say was the lowest point in your point?
sentences.chinese: 哪段日子可以算是你一生中最低潮的时光？

definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
though/although
although/even though/even if
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
surname Ye
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
actually/in fact/really
or/still/nevertheless/had better
to appear to be/to seem as if
really/indeed
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
indeed/really/reliable/real/true
but/however
